name: @cephalization/phoenix-insight
description: A CLI for Arize AI Phoenix data analysis with AI agents

scripts.prebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run verify-ui-dist
scripts.verify-ui-dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const uiDist = path.resolve(__dirname, '../ui/dist/index.html'); if (!fs.existsSync(uiDist)) { console.error('ERROR: UI dist not found. Build UI package first with: pnpm --filter @cephalization/phoenix-insight-ui build'); process.exit(1); } console.log('UI dist verified:', uiDist);"
scripts.copy-ui-dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = path.resolve(__dirname, '../ui/dist'); const dest = path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist/ui'); fs.cpSync(src, dest, { recursive: true }); console.log('UI dist copied to:', dest);"

author: oss@arize.com
